job_title: Community College Instructor in Dobson, NC
pros: Great place to work I loved it
cons: Pay is not competitive at all

job_title: Student Success Advisor in Dobson, NC
pros: I hear from employees that things have gotten better in Student Services.
cons: Used to be rough on Advisors.

pros: The school genuinely cares about their students and their faculty. Because it is a community college, the students typically have clear career goals. This gives them a little more drive to succeed.
cons: Like any institution with administration, things can get political. This can take time away from doing your job of teaching.

job_title: Student Services Assistant in Dobson, NC
pros: Friendly atmosphere and coworkers, flexible hours

review_title: Great  faculty/staff, much to be desired with administration
pros: Excellent instructors, great work culture among faculty and staff, good relationship with the community, beautiful campus
cons: Unstable work environment/budget, instructors are very limited by budgetary constraints, college revises and updates job descriptions to include more duties without an accompanying increase in pay, poor communication between administration and faculty/staff

pros: The environment is unbeatable. The people that you work with are truly the most beneficial part of the job. They make you want to come in to work every day.
cons: The pay will never be sufficient to that of other entities. I make $20,000 less than the median average salary for my particular field.

pros: Gave me a chance to get work history and experience with the public

cons: not much to say about cons
